explanation: To complete the task of putting a chilled bowl away in the cabinet under the toaster, the objects involved would be the Bowl and the Toaster. To execute the task, the bowl needs to be taken to the fridge to chill, then placed in the cabinet under the toaster. Similarly, to place a chilled plate in a cabinet, the Plate and the Cabinet would be the involved objects. The plate needs to be chilled and then placed in the cabinet.
